title: Can't spectate/view op.gg replays

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you running any third party applications that integrate with league (lolreplay, curse voice, etc)? If so, disable these.

Have you attempted a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)? Let me know if this helps.

I'm going to kill them with task manager now, I'm going to assume I don't have to uninstall them but I wouldn't be surprised if I did.

I'll try a repair right after I try it with those closed, I'll post back here shortly.

Right, so I closed BaronReplays and it worked, after a while everyone froze but it kept going on but I feel like that might have to do with the replay I was watching.

Should I try a repair anyway?

No, a repair shouldn't be needed. Applications that directly integrate with the game can potentially cause crashes after patches have been released.

In the future I recommend you to use http://www.replay.gg/ for your replays as this service requires no third party tools to be installed.
